Findelementvaluesthatsatisfythiscriterion.

Problem 3.19: Equivalent CircuitsandPowerSupposewehaveanarbitrarycircuitofresistorsthatwecollapseinto anequivalentresistorusingtheseriesandparallelrules.Isthepower dissipated by the equivalent resistor equal to the sum of the powers dissipated by the actual resistors comprising the circuit?
